Introduction
This topic contains information on FTI components, including
who provides income records
definition of FTI
Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) use of FTI
upfront verification
income verification match (IVM)
, and
security of Internal Revenue Service (IRS) tax information
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section A - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match:  General Information
